sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均含"一致的"之意。
means: compatible ： 指两个事物不仅无分歧，不互相排斥，而且可以并存，和谐地处在一起。
consistent ： 指各事物之间或同一物体各细节之间都能一致，不自相矛盾。

sentence.Network_en: These are clear consistent policies which we are putting into place.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些就是我们正在付诸实施的政策，不但清楚而且前后一致。

sentence.Network_en: There are consistent reports of electrical torture being practised on inmates.
sentence.Network_cn: 一直有报道称犯人被施以电刑。

sentence.Network_en: He was rational and consistent in the conduct of his affairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 他处理私事时头脑清楚，始终如一。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'consisting or composed of'): from Latin consistent- 'standing firm or still, existing', from the verb consistere (see consist)

encyclopedia.content: consistent <SCRIPT language=JavaScript type=text/javascript>echoFlash("http://res.iciba.com/resource/a/en/c/consistent.swf");</SCRIPT> adj. 一致的， 调和的， 坚固的， [数、统]相容的 词性及解释 a. 一致的， 坚持的， 并立的， 坚固的 反义词 inconsistent 例句 Logically correct or consistent. 合乎逻辑的逻辑上正确或一致的 not consistent or dependable. 不始终如一或者不可靠。 A consis

entry.tran: (行为、态度等)一贯的，一致的，始终如一的
entry.def: Someone who is  consistent always behaves in the same way, has the same attitudes towards people or things, or achieves the same level of success in something.

example.ex: Becker has never been the most consistent of players anyway.
example.tran: 不管怎么说，贝克尔从来就不是表现最为稳定的球员。
他对自由贸易始终如一的支持

entry.tran: （观点等）一致的，吻合的，不矛盾的
entry.def: If one fact or idea is consistent with another, they do not contradict each other.

example.ex: This result is consistent with the findings of Garnett & Tobin...
example.tran: 这个结果与加尼特托宾公司的调查结果一致。

example.ex: New goals are not always consistent with the existing policies.
example.tran: 新目标并不总是与现行政策一致。

entry.tran: (观点或看法)前后一致的，连贯的
entry.def: An argument or set of ideas that is consistent is one in which no part contradicts or conflicts with any other part.

example.ex: These are clear consistent policies which we are putting into place.
example.tran: 这些就是我们正在付诸实施的政策，不但清楚而且前后一致。

means.word_mean: 1. (sometimes followed by `with') in agreement or consistent or reliable;

sentences.sentence: "I have decided that the course of conduct which I am following is consistent with my sense of responsibility as president in time of war"- FDR

means.word_mean: 2. marked by an orderly, logical, and aesthetically consistent relation of parts;
4. the same throughout in structure or composition;

sentences.sentence: "bituminous coal is often treated as a consistent and homogeneous product"

auth_sentence.content: He has also been a consistent campaigner against corruption.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has also been a consistent campaigner against corruption.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has also been a consistent campaigner against corruption.

auth_sentence.content: He's been a really consistent performer for us.
auth_sentence.res_content: He's been a really consistent performer for us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He's been a really consistent performer for us.

auth_sentence.content: It isn't quite that good, that consistent.
auth_sentence.res_content: It isn't quite that good, that consistent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It isn't quite that good, that consistent.

Sentence.sentence: Although the negative emotions associated with romantic love — fear of loss, disappointment and jealousy — are fairly consistent across cultures, the positive feelings can vary.
They lack consistent support from peers.
Conformation occurs when others treat you in a manner consistent with who you believe you are.
A simple and consistent set of endings indicates grammatical functions of words.

means.word_mean: 一贯的, 始终如一的

sentences.en: She is a consistent girl in her feeling.
sentences.cn: 在感情方面她是个始终如一的女孩。

sentences.en: His account of what happened was consistent.
sentences.cn: 他对于所发生事情的叙述前后一致。

jushi.english: My father is a man with consistent habit.
jushi.chinese: 我父亲是一个生活习惯有规律的人。

jushi.english: She is a consistent supporter of women's rights.
jushi.chinese: 她是一个坚持不懈的女权支持者。

jushi.english: She is a consistent girl in her feeling.
jushi.chinese: 在感情方面她是个始终如一的女孩。
